chapters.title: Chapter 29: Another Plan
chapters.info: Lydel Elonid, p. 553 (644)—Man who will assume ownership of The Wandering Woman when Setalle Anan leaves Ebou Dar. She sold it to him because she did not like the Seanchan, but since he would be surprised to find Joline hiding in the cellar, she is not letting him take control of it just yet.
